name: Electric Sunset
description:
----- DESCRIPTION -----
Cruise the beach side shoreline in an electric surfer van while taking in the sunset. UNLOCK the full potential of your electric vehicle by picking up electric power boosts!

----- INFO ---
This short game was made in 48 hours during Game Dev Unlocked Game Jam #1.

----- CONTROLS -----
WASD/arrow keys: accelerate, reverse, turn

----- FEEDBACK -----
Feel free to leave a comment, or contact me on twitter: j_cassady_

----- CREDITS -----
Surfer mini van: beavystore.com
Electric vehicle interior sound: freesound.org/people/klankbeeld
Electricity font: dafont.com/electricity.font
